name: 9X9
description:
This game is currently in alpha stages and subject to change.

9X9 is a simple casual mobile puzzle game. The goal is to turn every block on in as few moves as possible. Tap a block to toggle it. Tapping a block also toggles its neighbors though, quickly turning what might seem like a simple solution into a complicated puzzle.

Currently, the game features 18 levels and one procedurally generated endless mode. More modes and levels are currently in development.
